name: Juan Fernando López Aguilar, María Soraya Rodríguez Ramos - § 37/2
green_remark: and to assess the potential extension of international protection granted to victims to their family members; calls on the MS to speed up family reunification procedures for the family members of the victims at risk in the country of origin;
title: Implementation of Directive 2011/36/EU on preventing and combating trafficking in human beings and protecting its victims
